title: Druid Spells
content: y allies. No effect on undead and constructs. Wall of Stone Lv 5 Evocation ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot Raise a wall of non magical, solid stone. Wall of Thorns Lv 6 Conjuration ActionLevel 6 Spell Slot 7~56 Damage7d8 Piercing Create a wall of pliable, twisted thorns surrounded by Entangling vines. 1 turn 18m DEX SaveConcentration Heroes' Feast Lv 6 Conjuration ActionLevel 6 Spell Slot You and everyone around can't be poisoned, diseased, or frightened.
